query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Preliminary report on Gothenburg lighthouse demonstration activities
result.description: Related to T72 Preliminary report on the intermediate results of the Gothenburg lighthouse demonstration activities comparing these results with the ambitions specifications and planning of the Gothenburg demonstration activities defined in D71 providing input for finetuning the Gothenburg citizen engagement activities and business models related to TT 1 to 4 leading to optimization of Gothenburg demonstration and replication activities until M60

result.title: Toolbox
result.description: The toolbox will provide the same information as MOOC only in a different format text The toolbox will be published at the end of the project to help wouldbe adopters utilise PoliRural methodology without minimal supervision in a different contexts As such Toolboxs purpose is to build capacity among third parties to address their rural policy objectives using lessons learned from PoliRural
